full_text:
The unit of civil rights is charged with assisting the City in developing a community with unity and harmony based on justice; a community free of discriminatory practices based on race, color, creed, age, sex, national origin, and thus enabling the City to benefit from the fullest realization of its human resource. 
(Ord. No. 1977-473, 3-15-77, §2)

2.name: CHAPTER 1. - THE DEPARTMENT OF COMMUNITY SERVICES
2.label: chapter

plain_text:
CODE OF STATE

PURPOSE. (§ 4-1011)

The unit of civil rights is charged with assisting the City in developing a
community with unity and harmony based on justice; a community free of
discriminatory practices based on race, color, creed, age, sex, national origin,
and thus enabling the City to benefit from the fullest realization of its human
resource. 
(Ord. No. 1977-473, 3-15-77, §2)
